attributes.action: We motion a vote of no confidence in our Government after the Brexit vote.
attributes.additional_details: It is the desire for power by vain selfish, arrogant politicians which has got us into this mess. They have potentially torn apart the United Kingdom and families in it.
attributes.background: The government of the UK has not acted in the best interest of its people. They should promote a secure way forward to prosperity and safety. Party in fighting and personal wants have been allowed to interfere with this.
